title: The Half-Demon Dragon Knight Is Obsessed With The Markgraf
alternative_title: 半魔の竜騎士は、辺境伯に執着される ; Hanma no Ryuukishi wa, Henkyouhaku ni Shuuchaku Sareru
status: 半魔の竜騎士は、辺境伯に執着される ; Hanma no Ryuukishi wa, Henkyouhaku ni Shuuchaku Sareru
description:
Description :
        In the Kingdom of Niels, where dragons fly, Kyle, a "half-demon" knight of demonic descent who can speak the tongue of dragons, has a faithful reunion with his past lover, Alfred. Three years ago, for reasons he keeps to himself, Kyle bid farewell to his boyfriend, though he has never forgotten about him. But Alfred, who had once been his direct superior, is now just a count of the borders, a Markgraf, while he is but an ordinary knight. Kyle also holds a certain secret, which he can never tell Alfred...Since he has no right to by his side, Kyle tries to distance himself from Alfred, but Alfred won't allow them to part―?
